msg: [SUREFIRE-432] Surefire swallows redirected test output if uncaught exceptions occur in forked SurefireBooter

author: nigel
msg: HADOOP-2342. Created a micro-benchmark for measuring local-file versus hdfs reads. Contributed by Owen O'Malley.

author: nigel
msg: HADOOP 2705. Increase default io.file.buffer.size from 4Kb to 32Kb. Deployments that are short on RAM might want to use the prior value. Contributed by Chris Douglas.
